listing.listing_description:
This is one of the few exclusive Four Seasons Private Villas inside the gates of the prestigious Punta Mita Resort. Located on the lavish hillside above the posh Four Seasons Resort Punta Mita, the peaceful villa boasts vivid ocean views out to the Marietas Islands and the Pacific Ocean.

Distinguished by a private infinity edge pool, spacious covered terraces, well-maintained patio areas, gourmet kitchen and an inviting four-bedroom design, Villa Vallarta-Punta Mita radiates Four Seasons quality and detailing. Masterfully carved antique Mexican wooden doors welcome you to your private courtyard entry, which reveals a villa that is a showcase for sophisticated, yet relaxed Mexican coastal architecture.

Villa Vallarta Punta Mita is a charming Primavera Model: Two-level, four-bedroom, four plus one 1/2 bath villa, with a lush private pool, hot tub, and adjacent garage for one car plus golf cart. It encompasses 6,475 square feet of magnificent living areas, with 4,275 square feet of fresh air-conditioned space.

Interiors feature design artistry, with touches that include furnishings and artwork from Mexicos finest artisans. Exquisite marble flooring, a generous use of discerning glass and radiant hardwood beams enrich your living experience.

listing.listing_description:
Find the perfect pairing of private house and five-star amenities at Tradewinds. A holiday at this luxury estate gives you attentive service by a full staff and access to the Half Moon Resort—all in a beautiful residence with five bedrooms. Reserve this Montego Bay vacation rental for a relaxed family gathering or a golf getaway with friends.

Your stay at Tradewinds includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and even a chauffeur for week-long trips. After your arrival, you’ll be greeted with Club Mobay VIP service and whisked to the villa on a complimentary airport transfer. Once at the estate, the infinity pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, al-fresco wet bar and barbecue are all yours to enjoy. There’s also an Apple TV, Sonos sound system, foosball table and Wi-Fi.

Take in views over the golf course to the coast of Jamaica from breezily sophisticated living and dining rooms inside the villa. Dark-wood furniture and roll-arm sofas add refinement to the open-concept space, while tropical prints are a playful touch. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and two in a cottage; all five have en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. Both cottage bedrooms have king beds and al-fresco showers, making it perfect as a honeymoon-style retreat for a couple or a quiet spot for a family traveling with younger children.

Golfers, rejoice: a stay at Tradewinds even includes complimentary membership to the Half Moon, White Witch and Cinnamon Hill golf courses—some of the best on Jamaica. Everyone else can relax by the pools and hot tub, check out the tennis courts and putting green, or order cocktails from the beach butlers at nearby Half Moon Resort.

Located on spectacular Shoal Bay East in the idyllic island paradise of Anguilla, Villa Black Pearl offers privacy, relaxed elegance and exquisite views. Just steps to one of the Caribbean’s most beautiful beaches, you will be perfectly positioned for the ultimate Caribbean holiday. Allow the vibrant colors and divine serenity of this magical spot to melt your cares away.

This tropical villa features a unique Mediterranean design including a domed roof and a barrel roof, as well as verandahs and pergolas throughout, allowing you to enjoy indoor/outdoor living to its fullest. While relaxing in any one of these areas, you will find solitude combined with a stunning panorama. The large outdoor living area is an ideal spot to toast the magnificent sunset, listen to the sounds of the sea and perhaps share a special announcement with your loved ones or entourage. During the day, laze about with the flotation devices in the heated swimming pool. From a gas grill, to alfresco showers and a roof deck bar with a gazebo, Villa Black Pearl aims to make this trip to Anguilla one for the books!

The indoor spaces at Villa Black Pearl are large and airy with ceiling fans and custom furniture fabricated in Thailand. Natural shell stone floors, rich kabukali and cherry woods and natural Anguilla stone walls contribute to the palatial and modern feelings embodied by the design and decor of this fabulous villa. Top-of-the-line fixtures and the finest amenities round out this villa’s chic Caribbean style.

Four exquisite and stately bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Villa Black Pearl. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and media centers. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements for everyone in the family. Your reservation includes housekeeping and a villa manager who will do everything to make your stay comfortable and carefree.

An oasis of privacy and serenity right next to the luminous white sands of Shoal Bay Beach along a manicured seaside path – what more could you ask for this vacation? Just a short walk from some excellent restaurants and minutes from town and golf, when the day comes to pack your bags, you will wonder where all the time went. This feeling has made Villa Black Pearl a popular repeat destination for our distinguished guests. Your vacation, your way!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Na'iik is a stunning vacation rental that will leave you mesmerized as you drift through its open rooms and spacious outdoor spaces. Feel the soft sea breeze while taking in the charming views of the Sian Kaan coastline and lush tropical jungle. Quiet and secluded, this private seafront retreat located in Tulum along the Mayan Riviera is the perfect antidote to the stress of modern life.

Step outside and enjoy the many terraces at this upscale villa. With a drink in your hand and the wind in your hair, enjoy the stunning sunsets from the spectacular rooftop while you splash in the infinity pool with a “looking glass” bottom. Other outdoor features at Na'iik include an alfresco dining set for twelve, hammocks and sun beds. For some fun in the water, head to the private beach with the villa’s kayaks and snorkeling gear. The indoor perks at Na'iik are perfectly suited for the modern family. Enjoy a movie on the Home theatre overhead projection system and make use of the sound system, Wi-Fi and yoga mats.

This contemporary villa represents a fusion of Caribbean design and a sensibility for avant-garde luxury that creates a stylish beach hideaway par excellence. The living and dining areas offer an open plan and a stellar view of the Caribbean. The modern kitchen is fully equipped. You will be pampered by the professional staff; concierge, butler, chef, housekeeper, and groundskeeper are all included.

Four breathtaking bedrooms accommodate up to eight adults and four children. All of the bedrooms provide en-suite bathrooms, king size beds, dual vanities, Sky TV, air conditioning, ceiling fans and hammocks. The two sea view suites offer stunning turquoise views and stone bath tub. Every suite has a day bed perfect to accomodate a child. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Optimal for family reunions or luxurious weddings, Na'iik provides every perk to make this a truly memorable vacation in the sun. Enjoy the pleasure of a private beach, or take a short ride to one of the Mayan Riviera’s nearby cenotes, aqua parks or mayan ruins. In Tulum, you can discover a lively seaside town with excellent restaurants and shopping. In Playa del Carmen, you will find an exciting nightlife and top level golf courses. Enjoy the vacation of a lifetime at this exquisite residence in the heart of the Mexican Caribbean!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover an oasis of luxury and style just North of Puerto Vallarta at the Punta Mita Mexico Resort. World class beaches, stunning architecture, fine dining, water sports and golf are all readily available within the authentic culture of Mexico. Hacienda de Mita 405 is also the perfect base camp for exploring the wonders of Puerto Vallarta, Sayulita and Yelapa. Come get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

The beautiful infinity-edge swimming pool with opposing contours sits right next to the pristine sands of a picture-perfect beach dotted with palm trees. Or enjoy a soothing soak in the bubbles of the outdoor hot tub. The grounds at Hacienda de Mita 405 also feature a lovely alfresco dining set and a terrace with a lounge area. The interiors feature HDTV, Apple TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge. There’s even a telescope for stargazing. Guests receive complimentary access to a six passenger golf cart with a sound system. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

Hacienda de Mita 405 integrates modern, functional design with a traditional Mexican feel. This single-story, third floor condo offers 3,546 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space. The main living space extends onto the terrace that offers magnificent views of the garden and Jack Nicklaus Golf Course as well as direct access to the garden and pool area. The fully equipped kitchen features luxury finishes with marble floors and coverings throughout, chancellery with template glass and double crystal windows as well as tropical solid wood. One additional flex-room with a bath and laundry area can be used as service quarters, extra bedroom, media room or studio.

Three fabulous bedrooms and additional bedding accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans and televisions. You will have your choice of king beds, queens and a twin. Both master suites feature jetted tubs and walk-in closets.

During your stay at Hacienda de Mita 405, you will be just a few minutes by golf cart from tennis and golf. Ask our dedicated concierge about the Premier-Golf Membership with access to the Pacifico and Bahia Golf Courses, the Resident’s Beach Club, Kupuri Beach Club, the restaurants at the Four Seasons and St. Regis and the fitness facility. Your dream villa in Punta Mita awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Casa Reposada is a spectacular five-bedroom home within the Encanto de la Laguna community in Los Cabos, just steps from the beach and six miles from downtown San José del Cabo. Built in a vintage colonial style with terracotta roof tile, luminous white facades, and rich natural wood accents, the villa comprises 3,970 square feet of interior living space and 3,000 square feet of outdoor terraces with stunning views of the Sea of Cortez.

Multiple alfresco lounges and dining tables invite you to enchanting days and evenings in the Pacific breeze. On the lower terrace, savor a delicious soak in the elevated hot tub and plunge into the sparkling pool. Sunbathe in the brilliant light and withdraw into the shaded pavilion for afternoon tapas and cocktails. Kindle the fire pit in the evening and warm your bellies with classic Mexican refreshments. A lovely spiral staircase leads to the upper terrace, which offers a second fire pit, dining table, and privileged ocean views.

Pocket doors fuse the pool terrace with the villa's interior, inhaling the ocean breeze into the home. The open-concept living area includes an ample sofa facing a mounted TV, a beautiful rustic table, and a gourmet kitchen with a long bar seating six. The kitchen harmonizes rich wooden cabinetry with chef-grade, stainless steel appliances, while the living area blends fresh white wall finishes with earthy, antique accents like exposed wood beams and a stone column. A separate media room welcomes cozy downtime.

All five bedroom suites feature king beds, air conditioning, and ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys a private balcony, sublime ocean views, a walk-in closet, and a soaking tub in its deluxe bathroom. The second bedroom enjoys a private balcony as well, while a guest bedroom is detached from the main house, offering extra privacy.

The villa offers a fine balance of privacy amid the myriad resorts and pleasures of Los Cabos. About two hundred feet form the beach at Encanto de la Laguna, you're also just five minutes by car from the Puerto Los Cabos Marina and fifteen minutes from the colonial beauty of San Jose del Cabo. Golfers are five minutes from Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course, while other world-class fairways are in easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Paraiso offers you sumptuous luxury and style in the impeccable beachfront oasis of Belizean Cove Estates, overlooking Ambergris Caye in the magical Caribbean.

Welcome to Villa Paraiso, where your day starts with the spectacular sunrise beyond the dazzling Caribbean Sea. Spacious and opulently finished Villa Paraiso is resplendent in cream with pillared fittings, high ceilings and marble finishes. Colorful and exotic artwork by local artists adorns the walls and provides interesting and striking highlights. Comfortable yet elegantly furnished, a main feature of Villa Paraiso is its large living space where you can really enjoy family time. Opening up the French doors you enter your private terrace and beyond the lush and stunning pool area. Why not take a dip or take some time out in the hot tub? If you’d prefer to feel the sand between your toes, the beach is just a short stroll from this luxurious pool area. From here you can also take out a sea kayak and go exploring the sparkling Caribbean.

In the evening head inside and browse the DVD collection. Relax in front of one of several flat-screen televisions, curl up with a good book or prepare a meal in your fully equipped kitchen and entertain friends or family in the spacious dining area that seats six.

After a hard day relaxing, your three restful and luxurious bedrooms await! All feature opulent marble bathrooms for your utmost comfort. Decorated with colorful local artwork and floral bedding they’ll envelop you in the vibrancy and tranquility of the Caribbean. The master bedroom offers a king size bed and adjoining spacious bathroom with shower, whirlpool tub and double sinks. The second bedroom is ideal for families with young children with its queen bed and twin day bed. Enjoying its own separate entrance leading out to the garden, the third bedroom is furnished with a king size bed.

Villa Paraiso is the perfect location to appreciate the magic of Belize. The only town on the island, San Pedro Town, is just 3 miles away, and you can also visit the tennis and basketball courts that are just one mile away. The island is home to the famous coral reef, second largest in the world, and runs the length of the whole island. The airport is just 5.5 km away.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

listing.listing_description:
Located in the lush oceanside community of Manuel Antonio, this airy Costa Rican villa is the perfect escape for beach-bound vacationers. Surrounded by lush, tropical jungle, Villa Perezoso exists in unprecedented privacy, despite its proximity to beaches, nature reserves, and the shops, bars, and restaurants of Quepos Town. With five luxurious ensuite bedrooms, spacious common areas, and a scenic balcony, Perezoso has plenty of lounge space and vantage points for your group of twelve.

Inside, Villa Perezoso is designed and decorated in relaxing Balinese style. Perfect for inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within, Perezoso’s open-concept layout features numerous openings to the balcony’s jungle and ocean view. Always the consummate host, Perezoso features two fully equipped kitchens, formal dining for ten, and a penthouse loft area that is perfect for group gatherings. The decor is a relaxing mix of Balinese inspired art, designer furniture, and locally inspired accent pieces. And, Perezoso comes with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and cable television to keep guests cool and connected.

Outside, you’ll love cooling off on hot afternoons in Perezoso’s refreshing swimming pool. At night, rejuvenate in the hot tub while you count the stars. You’ll also appreciate the many sun loungers, alfresco dining, barbecue, and furnished lounge areas outside on the ocean-view balcony.

With four pristine beach areas just minutes from home, you’ll have no trouble finding the perfect secluded spot to work on your tan. Tulemar, Espadilla, Playitas, and Biesanz beaches are all under two-kilometers from Villa Perezoso’s hillside perch. If you’d like to explore Costa Rica’s natural jungle habitat and learn a little about its local flora and fauna, the Manual Antonio National Park is a beautiful place to spend an afternoon. Travel a little further, and you’ll find the town of Quepos, rich with local boutique shops, delicious cuisine, and the Quepos Tennis Club if you’re up for a match.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Greatview is perched on a lush hillside at Montego Bay on the north shore of Jamaica, with majestic, panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Practically a private resort unto itself, the villa features two swimming pools and fabulous amenities for dining, relaxation, wellness, and play. The friendly and skilled staff will enhance your experience, whether by preparing delicious meals, hosting the on-site Kids' Club, or driving you on excursions in the villa's private passenger van. Your vacation rental additionally includes access to the world-class Half Moon Luxury Resort and the golf courses at White Witch and Cinnamon Hill.

The terraced estate offers expansive spaces for admiring the enchanting vistas and savoring the outdoor lifestyle of Jamaica. Two pool terraces (one with hot tub as well) and plentiful lounge chairs invite you to bask in the Caribbean sun and breeze, while spacious lanais and verandas welcome alfresco meals and cocktails in the soothing shade. The upper-floor balconies enjoy extraordinary prospects, and there is even a telescope for stargazing. Kids will delight in the log cabin tree house perched amid sea grape and orchid trees, with its own playground and indoor living area.

The villa's spectacular interiors include a cavernous great room with two-story ceilings, French doors opening to the veranda, and a superb dining area and salon. Game tables and high-end entertainment equipment inspire light-hearted downtime and festive nights, and there is a well-appointed exercise room overlooking the forest and sea. The main house is wheelchair accessible and the entire villa enjoys air conditioning.

All of the bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms (two of which feature jetted tubs), and several of the rooms enjoy sublime views. The Plantation Green Room includes a beautiful king bed, a jetted tub in its bathroom, a private sitting area, a built-in entertainment system, and an outdoor shower. The Cottage includes two twin beds (or a split king), a sleeper sofa suitable for a child, and a small kitchen.

Half Moon Luxury Resort is within easy reach and offers world-class amenities including a superb championship golf course, 3.2 km of beachfront, an extraordinary spa, and the award-winning Sugar Mill restaurant. The villa is also just ten minutes from Montego Bay and its international airport.

For animal lovers, a few friendly dogs live on the grounds but will not venture into the home or pool area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Look out over Land’s End from Penasco. Set above the coast in the exclusive community of Pedregal, this Los Cabos vacation rental commands views of both sunrise and sunset, as well as Cabo San Lucas and the resorts along Solmar Beach. Invite up to fourteen friends or family members to join you in what feels like your own private boutique hotel on high.

Your holiday at this luxury property includes daily American-style breakfast and housekeeping, along with the use of pool floats and beach towels. Take in the incredible views from the home’s heated infinity pool, which has a shallow area perfect for lounging, hot tub, or one of the lounge chairs on the terrace. As the sun begins to set, heat up the barbecue and settle in to the dining area under the pergola for the nightly show.

Slide-away glass doors let the views be the star of the villa’s sleek modern rooms. Stretch out on the sectional in the living room and watch a parade of fishing boats round the El Arco rock formation or see if you can spot whales from the dining room. The gourmet kitchen is well equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and granite countertops. There’s also a separate fitness room and media room.

Penasco is divided into two pavilions with three bedrooms each. The left pavilion has two bedrooms with king beds and one with two queen beds, while the right pavilion has two bedrooms with king beds plus an apartment with a queen bed that’s ideal for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Though it feels like you have a bird’s-eye view over Baja, Penasco is within walking distance of the Pedregal tennis court and a 1-minute drive from the beach. Avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play at the nearest course, a 15-minute drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Sardinia is a stunning, one-bedroom beachfront villa on the island of Providenciales, in Turks and Caicos. Situated directly on the white sands of Taylor Bay Beach, as part of a private, three-villa complex, your vacation rental features one beautiful bedroom suite, lovely indoor and outdoor living areas, and spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea, creating the ideal setting in this island paradise for honeymoons and romantic escapes.

Savor dreamy days in the Caribbean sun, plunging into the turquoise waters and strolling your secluded stretch of beach, before returning to your private terrace to bathe in the lagoon-like swimming pool. Relax on elegant loungers while sipping champagne and gazing on the spectacular ocean view. Then join each other at the alfresco table in the covered veranda for a delicious barbeque meal. Lovely lighting invites you to breathe the ocean air deep into the night.

Wide glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's living room, inviting ocean views and breezes inside. The bright and lovely lounge is ideal for watching movies and enjoying cocktails together, while the luminous, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar sets the stage for inspired mixology and sumptuous feasts. The understated but exquisite design and décor, including superb artwork and tasteful touches of vibrant, sea-inspired color, echo the stunning natural beauty of this heavenly island.

The villa's bedroom, located on the upper floor, is the ideal space for sumptuous relaxation. A king bed looks out on expansive ocean views. Wide glass doors open to the furnished balcony overlooking the pool, where you'll enjoy morning coffee and evening cocktails. The ensuite bathroom, joined to the bedroom by an open wall gazing out on the ocean, features a stand-alone tub and stand-alone shower.

Villa Sardinia offers the perfect combination of seclusion and convenience. In addition to the stretch of Turtle Bay Beach, the three-villa complex has a private tennis court. Beyond the villas, downtown Providenciales, with its shops and restaurants, is about seven kilometers away, as is Providenciales National Airport. Provo Golf and Country Club, boasting one of the finest courses in the Caribbean, is an easy drive. The precious natural beauty of Princess Alexandra National Park is about twelve kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located along Provo’s stunning Long Bay Beach, Pearl West is one of three homes within the Pearls of Long Bay Estate property. The perks at this luxury vacation rental have been set to overdrive for fun in the sun and pleasant repose. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve, next holiday, at this exclusive oceanfront property in the Turks and Caicos!

The grounds at Pearl West include two swimming pools and a children’s wading pool. Or perhaps it’s time for a soothing soak in the therapeutic bubbles of the hot tub? Decked out for the consummate entertainer, you will also find the following: alfresco dining for eight, a pool bar, a Japanese teppanyaki cooking station, a barbeque, sun loungers, umbrellas, a beachside sound system and a children’s play set. The interiors of this elegant residence are equally impressive with a stunning home theater room with popcorn machine, cable television, an indoor/outdoor sound system and other divertissements including Netflix, Apple TV and a DVD/Blu-ray player. Your reservation includes housekeeping, and a private chef.

Pearl West offers guests uninterrupted views of the turquoise waters spanning the Caicos Banks while marrying contemporary design with Caribbean barefoot luxury. This stunning home seamlessly harmonizes the idea of indoor/outdoor living with beautiful landscaping, decks and lagoons throughout for 12,000 square feet of sophisticated living. High vaulted ceilings and plenty of overhead fans keep the feelings airy and breezy.

Eight exquisite bedroom suites accommodate up to twenty guests at this non-smoking villa. Access to the outdoors is a breeze! All of the suites offer dual vanities, televisions, Netflix and Apple TV. Sleep soundly with nothing but the ocean waves as your soundtrack!

Pearl West shares first class amenities reminiscent of a five star resort with the other homes at this estate. Continue your workout regime in the state of the art 1,000 square foot gymnasium or get together for some tennis on the championship court. Relax in the Turkish steam bath, sauna or alfresco massage pavilion. The Provo Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Pearl West is ideal for a group of family or friends and can even serve as the locale for a dream wedding or a decadent honeymoon!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Unwind Baja style at the charming contemporary Casa Naah Payil. This stylish Cabo del Sol vacation rental has everything you need for the ideal Los Cabos holiday: views of the Sea of Cortez; welcoming indoor-outdoor living spaces; and a location in The Corridor close to beaches, golf and more. Four bedrooms plus the option to use a fifth room mean you can soak up the Cabo sun with up to twelve friends or family members.

Watch fishing boats and catamarans ply the ocean from the comfort of a private terrace with a heated pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a wet bar. As the sun sinks toward the horizon, heat up the barbecue and firepit and linger outdoors. Inside, you’ll find a TV and sound system, plus Wi-Fi and a wine fridge.

Open on two sides to the terrace and a courtyard, the villa’s great room is bright and inviting. Natural wood and woven chairs lend organic appeal to the sitting area, while there’s plenty of room around the large dining table. Even the fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar where you can perch for the morning’s first coffee or an afternoon snack.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with two queen beds and one bedroom with two double beds plus a bunk bed. Guests also have the option to use a fifth bedroom with a bunk bed. All five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.

Casa Naah Payil is a short drive from swimmable Medano Beach, where you can play in the water or sample the cocktails and seafood at Tabasco, and from tennis courts and the nearest golf course. For lively restaurants and nightlife, head into Cabo San Lucas; for a gallery walk or quiet honeymoon-worthy dinner, drive into San Jose del Cabo.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover a Bahamas hideaway that will make you believe in magic at Unicorn Cay. This one-of-a-kind vacation rental was built by Rosita Forbes, a famed writer and explorer who traveled widely throughout north Africa and the Middle East before settling on Eleuthera Island. The four-bedroom house was inspired by a French chateau and commands 12 acres of private grounds and nearly 500 feet of pink-sand beach. And today, it welcomes not just adventurers, but those looking to unwind and reconnect with friends and family.

Take in the views from the shaded verandas and patios lining the house, or relax in the sunny central courtyard on a lounger or sun bed by the pool. There’s a barbecue where you can prep local specialties and an al-fresco dining table where you can enjoy them. Kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkel equipment are provided for your use, and the villa has a golf cart you can take to the Unicorn Cay beach. In the evening, entertain inside around the hand-crafted walnut bar, spend a quiet moment in the library or keep up with favorite shows or games on the satellite TV.

A gated entrance flanked by turrets sets the stately, European-inspired tone for this grande dame of Caribbean estates. It was recently restored to bring out the original features, from Abaco pine floors and woodwork to native stone, and add a touch of modern luxury—think gourmet appliances in the fully equipped kitchen. In the living and dining areas, built-in bookcases, coffered ceilings and a broad fireplace continue the feel of inviting elegance.

Each of the property’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens onto the courtyard. There is one master suite with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The beautiful traditional interiors, which include details like four-poster beds and ornate chests, give the feeling of staying in someone’s country estate on holiday.

The villa’s charms extend to its 470 feet of pink-sand beach, perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll or snorkeling on the nearby reefs. Its location near Governor’s Harbour is close to several fine restaurants, as well as the Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve. For an easy day trip, drive to the ferry docks and ride over to Harbour Island for a few hours of exploration.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled within Gros Islet near the northern tip of St. Lucia, Xhale is a beautiful luxury villa featuring expansive views of the Caribbean Sea and Anse Galet Bay framed by verdant shoreline hills. With four bedrooms sleeping eight, it's the ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests, groups of friends, and families seeking privacy and total comfort in this dreamy island paradise.

The villa is perfectly designed to create seamless transitions between its indoor and outdoor spaces. A lovely terrace with infinity swimming pool and ocean views forms the villa's peaceful core, while the wraparound balcony includes additional lounge areas for plein air relaxation. In the afternoon, fire up the grill for some delicious seafood barbeque, and gather around the fire pit in the evening as cooler breezes blow.

Sliding glass doors create an alfresco feel within the villa's living spaces, where the exquisite décor and furnishings echo the natural beauty of the island and sea. On one side of the pool terrace, an open-plan kitchen-and-dining area features an ocean-view table for eight and a luminous, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar. On the other side of the pool terrace, a spacious living room includes a large TV and sumptuous furnishings. These two wings are connected by an additional lounge and the gorgeous stone wall extending from the earth through both of the villa's levels. The villa also includes a well-equipped, ocean-view fitness room as well as a quiet office space.

Xhale includes four beautiful bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms, private balconies, and ocean views. The master bedroom has a king size bed, and its bathroom features a stand-alone bath beside an ocean-view glass wall. The other three bedrooms all have queen beds. With exquisite décor and cozy bedding, the bedrooms are ideal for afternoon private time and nights of peaceful rest.

Xhale provides an ideal location for exploring St. Lucia. You're just a short drive or bicycle ride to Plantation Beach, Pigeon Island Beach, and Reduit Beach, while the natural treasure of Pigeon Island National Park is only a few kilometers away. If you dream of Caribbean golf, St. Lucia Golf and Country Club is just minutes from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Manzu is located within the lush grounds of the Peninsula Papagayo in Costa Rica, a completely private sanctuary on a small peninsula of its own.   Villa Manzu offers eight oversized suites spread across the 30,000 square feet Villa.  There is plenty of room to spread out, from the two swimming pools and spa to the theater room and expansive bar/party room. The grounds are dotted with hammocks, chairs and restful areas, perfect for quiet moments taking in 180-degree sea views and watching monkeys cavort in the trees. Adventure guides will customize your stay to ensure that you live the Costa Rican adventure and immerse you in the Costa Rican culture. 

Villa Manzu is by far a superior experience as your stay at includes the services of a private chef, servers, bartender, butler, driver, and even an adventure specialist to arrange excursions. Spend your vacation hiking down to the beach, relaxing in the two heated pools and hot tub, practicing on the yoga platform or using the available sports equipment, from fishing and snorkeling gear to stand-up paddleboards, surfboards and kayaks. Catch a movie in the home theater, treat yourself to the sauna and steam room, work out in the fitness room and gather for a game in the recreation room.  It is as if you are coming to the finest of boutique hotels yet have the place all to yourselves! 

Pricing is an all-encompassing price that allows for Villa Manzu staff to attend to all the needs of our guests with no further charges.  This includes transportation needs, adventure guides, and toys to enjoy the Villa and surrounding beaches and property. The most wonderful part of the stay is the cuisine.  We have an exceptional team of chefs that have been with us for many years now which all our visiting writers have raved upon.  Custom menus prepared by our own exclusive executive chef team are included with every stay; as well as fresh homemade cuisine including fresh baked breads, sweets, and room snacks and mini bars. A butler team provides all day and evening service of hand choose fine wine, top shelf cocktail recipes, smoothies, local fruit drinks and more.  

Both the outdoor and indoor living spaces are decorated with modern shapes and neutral tones for a chic contemporary feel. In the living rooms, white upholstery and wicker and wood textures are set off by pink piping and patterned coral throw cushions. High ceilings and transom windows make the air-conditioned rooms feel airy and light, but full-length drapes and tailored area rugs anchor the look. The dining room has a formal stone-topped table and ocean views for elegant dinners, and the spacious kitchen has a long breakfast bar.

There are six suites in the main house at Villa Manzu and two in a separate casita; each bedroom is a full oversized suite and each has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, mini bar with coffee service and walk-in closet. In the main house, two suites have California king beds, ocean views and balconies.  The opulent bunk suite has two king beds and four twin beds along with ocean views.  There are two additional suites, each of which has double california king beds.  There is a sixth suite in the main house that has a California king bed.  In the casita, there are two bedrooms with king beds, balconies and partial ocean views; along with a private living room. 

Guests of Villa Manzu have access to the Peninsula Papagayo golf and tennis clubhouse, marina and Prieta Beach Club, as well as the restaurants at the Four Seasons hotel, all about a half-mile away. There’s a beach 100 yards from the villa down a short hiking trail, and both Nacazcol Beach and Prieta Beach are a half-mile away by golf cart. A healthcare facility is 11 miles away, and the Liberia airport, downtown Liberia, Coco and a grocery store are 18 miles away.

listing.listing_description:
This villa’s name is a tribute to Soliman Bay, a hidden gem and one of the most protected bays along the Mayan Riviera. Villa Soliman is a place where visitors experience true simplicity and refinement, where everything slows down and the wristwatch becomes the sun in the sky once again. Here time reveals itself in the gentle passing of the clouds, the cool sea breeze and the colors of crystalline water. Come immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the gorgeous bay and unique serenity at Villa Soliman.

Lounge in the swimming pool or relax next to it in the outdoor lounging area. With stunning ocean views right from your villa, and perfect lounging spots, you can hang out and bask in the sunshine all day long. Varieties of palm trees and tropical plants surrounding the infinity swimming pool create a heavenly environment. Your villa includes a rooftop terrace with hot tub, kayaks, snorkeling equipment, daily housekeeping service and a meet-and-greet.

Sitting behind the sand dunes, Villa Soliman harmoniously integrates elements of nature into the design of the house. Inspired by the beauty of Soliman Bay, the interiors of the villa feature minimalist furnishing combined with a playful mix of soothing colors that reflect the laid-back, beachside lifestyle. Two fully equipped kitchens, two interior dining areas and two elegant living rooms create a dual living environment perfect for friends and families to get their space.

This villa has six ocean view bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and private terraces facing the ocean. Accommodating up to twelve guests, Villa Soliman is perfect for families, corporate retreats and diverse groups. Relax and unwind on the pristine linens and luxuriously comfortable beds to emerge rejuvenated and refreshed each new morning.

Nestled on a sandy beach with palm trees looking out over the crystal blue Caribbean, this truly inviting Mayan Riviera beachfront villa offers a spectacular experience. Activities on Soliman Bay include swimming, snorkeling, kayaking and diving, all accessible from the white sand beach. Enjoy the stunning natural beauty of Mexico and relax in your home away from home at Villa Soliman!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
This superbly placed, modern and maritime-styled listing is located right on Ffryes Beach, one of Antigua’s very best. With storybook white sands and turquoise waters, guests can take advantage of a surfing, snorkeling and jet-skiing paradise, before retiring to the seaside terrace and crisp, cool infinity pool. The bright lights of St.Johns, the capital, are just 25 minutes drive away.

 

This apartment is packed with possibilities for a small family / group of friends. From the entrance, guests can literally walk onto Ffryes Beach with towel in hand and choose a pristine spot to soak up the Carribean sun. After a dip in the wonderfully warm water, pick up an Antiguan speciality (jerk chicken, or freshly fried fish) from a beachside restaurant, before taking a short walk to the towering ruins of the local sugar windmill. Similarly, Tamarind Hills Silver is the perfect starting point for an island drive, taking in stunning seaside cliffs, leafty palm-covered hills, and cool drinks in welcoming roadside bars.

 

Guests can also opt to enjoy Antigua’s famed hot weather and sea views from the listing itself, via a shaded sun lounger or by lingering in the pool. The apartment’s climate control is never more than a few steps away, where the airy balcony and ocean-view windows ensuring a true sense of place is established, with all the modern conveniences one would expect. When night comes, fire up the barbecue and try some of the Antiguan ways of cooking, with fresh food from the local market. On this island, nothing is ever too far, and the colourful streets of St.Johns just a short drive away, with its hive-of-activity markets, welcoming harbourside bars and the great buzz of game days at the Cricket Grounds. 

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Brilliant blue waters and sugar-white sands are an incredible backdrop for the brand-new Alinna Villa. With five bedrooms on a single level, plenty of provided water sports equipment and a Chalk Sound location close to two popular beaches, it’s a wonderful destination for a beach holiday with extended family or a Turks and Caicos getaway with friends.

Take in the stunning ocean views from outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, loungers, hammock and barbecue, or get close to the water on the provided kayaks and paddleboards. In the evenings, gather around the firepit or head indoors to enjoy the pool table, media room, cable TV and Wi-Fi. The villa also has a gym and office space so it’s easy to keep up with your routines.

Fold-away glass doors lead from the villa’s sleek terrace to its breezy great room, where mid-century inspired sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen are laid out under a vaulted ceiling. Pops of turquoise in the artwork and fabrics echo the color of the sea outside, and the open-concept floor plan means there’s room for everyone.

This luxury vacation rental has four honeymoon-worthy master suites with king beds and ocean views, including one with a private al-fresco shower. The fifth bedroom is set up for younger guests, with two sets of bunk beds and its own outdoor shower. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Thanks to its location on Chalk Sound, Alinna Villa is just steps from a bay that’s part of a national park, with several small islands within easy paddling distance. It’s a short drive from Sapodilla and Taylor Bay beaches, two of the most popular on the island for their relatively sheltered coves, as well as the pristine waters of Princess Alexandra National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like an automatic filter, sunshine casts a golden glow over pool, patio, and great room at this Italian-inspired villa on a St. John hillside. It’s one of several villas clustered like a Mediterranean hilltop town above the harbor, commanding views over the ocean to neighboring St. Thomas. Walk to the shared clubhouse or drive down to dining and the ferry docks in Cruz Bay.

Watch boats move through the channel and birds flit across the sky from the two-level terrace, which features plenty of loungers gathered around the private swimming pool, plus a barbecue and alfresco table that invite you to stay out and watch the sunset.

Double doors lead from the sun-splashed warmth of the terrace into the shade of the great room, whose polished marble floors are cool underfoot. Settle into the sofa and chairs here, plan the next day’s adventures around a dining table for 6, or refuel before the next activity at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

It’s a short walk from the villa to the fitness center and clubhouse at The Hills for a few laps in the shared pool, a stint on the rowing machine, or a cocktail at the bar. Drive or take a taxi down to Cruz Bay to stroll amid shops and restaurants or to arrange a snorkeling or diving excursion. You can also set off to one of the 7 beaches within a 9-kilometer drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Breathtaking natural scenery outside and local materials and artwork inside create a true sense of place at Villa Watina. Just steps from the golden sands of Ambergris Caye Beach and a short drive from the town of San Pedro, this oceanfront Belize vacation rental has a setting that’s both postcard perfect and convenient. Hand-crafted furniture and decor and three suite-style bedrooms create an ambience of thoughtful luxury for family getaways or beach holidays with friends.

An array of shared pools and hot tubs is the only thing between Villa Watina and the Caribbean Sea. Swim a few laps there, stretch out in a lounge chair on the pool terrace or step down to the beach and borrow a sea kayak or stand-up paddleboard to take out on the water. If you’d rather explore on land, pedal one of the bicycles through the seaside landscape. In the evenings, the surround sound system, movie collection and Wi-Fi are sure to entertain.

Stone floors, stately columns and beamed ceilings give the villa the elegance of a Tuscan country estate, but the furniture and artwork bring in Central American style. Wicker sofas, stools and side tables have relaxed natural texture, throw pillows add lively pattern and color and plenty of polished wood is a nod to the rainforests of Belize. Sit down to a memorable dinner at the formal dining area, or a more casual meal at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are inviting private retreats at the end of a day in the sun by the pool or exploring the area. The master bedroom is as well appointed as a honeymoon suite, with a king bed, jetted tub, ocean views and a balcony. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds; one opens to a balcony as well.

Plan to fly into San Pedro Airport, 3.5 miles from Villa Watina, or Philip S.W. Goldson International Airport, 48 miles away. From the villa’s location on Ambergris Caye Beach, you can book a tour or diving expedition through Tuff E Nuff Tours, just over a half-mile away, get out on the tennis or basketball courts 1 mile away, or find shopping and dining in the town of San Pedro, 3 miles away. If you can’t get enough of the sand and warm water, it’s worth making a trip to X’Tan Ha Beach, 4.5 miles away, or Hol Chan Marine Reserve, 7 miles away.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/the-secrets-out-on-ambergris-caye/)

listing.listing_description:
Capturing breathtaking views of Guana Bay Point, this luxurious six bedroom is the perfect destination for a sunny Caribbean getaway in beautiful St. Martin. Villa Amalia is located minutes from duty-free shopping, vibrant nightlife, and pristine beachfront on Guana Bay Beach. And, it’s just twelve kilometers from St. Martin’s bustling capital, Marigot.

Drawing influence from its colonial heritage, Villa Amalia displays traditional Spanish revivalist design. Similar to the mansions of Beverly Hills, this villa is all about luxury, and the appreciation of its beautiful natural surroundings. Soothing white walls, rounded archways, and a red-clay roof provide the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of the Caribbean. With openings to outdoor spaces in nearly every room, you’ll have no trouble filling Amalia with the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. Inside, you’ll appreciate the elegant marble flooring, peaked wood ceilings, and high-end furniture and electronics. Spacious living rooms and smaller sitting areas make it easy for guests to gather as a group or break-away for more intimate moments. And, no matter where you decide to spend your time, the amazing ocean view is right there with you.

Villa Amalia’s six bedrooms all feature en-suite bathrooms, king or queen-sized beds, and all but one have scenic ocean views. At dinner, there’s formal and alfresco dining, and indoor and outdoor sound systems to set the perfect tone. After dinner, stay inside and enjoy the pool table, dart board, ping pong table, exercise room, and spa, or you could venture to the terrace for a swim in the saltwater infinity pool. During your stay, you’ll have the assistance of daily housekeeping, chef services, and a pool keeper.

The nearest town to Villa Amalia is Philipsburg, the capital of the island’s Dutch side. There, you’ll find a beautiful boardwalk lined with beachfront bars, duty-free shopping, and Casino Rouge et Noir. After Philipsburg, head north to St. Martin’s French side and check out their capital, Marigot, where you’ll find the Marigot Market, a wide range of dining establishments, water sports activities, and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a tropical vacation with hacienda flair at Villa Mariposa. Set on a hill outside Nosara and looking out to the forest and Pacific Ocean, this luxury Costa Rica vacation rental has beautiful views. Reserve the four-bedroom villa for a relaxed warm-weather holiday, or book it with the neighboring Casa Colibri to host a memorable family reunion or intimate destination wedding amid lush scenery.

The villa is surrounded by a covered porch with sitting and dining areas perfect for reading, napping or just sitting with a cocktail in the balmy breeze. There’s an infinity pool that seems to stretch into the treetops and a private garden for your exclusive use. Listen to birdsong along with your breath at the yoga platform between Villa Mariposa and the neighboring casa, or inquire about using the shared soccer field and tennis courts.

Traditional stucco walls and a tiled roof open to a gracious open-plan living area. Wrought-iron chandeliers and beamed ceilings have a bit of hacienda style, while streamlined banquette seating and wicker chairs are comfortable and modern. The spacious, fully equipped open kitchen pairs its own chandelier with rich-toned wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast bar.

Villa Mariposa has four air-conditioned bedrooms one with a king bed, and three with queens; two have ensuite bathrooms and two share a bathroom. A daybed in the master bedroom, and another in a main room/hall means the property can accommodate up to ten guests, if necessary. With floral bedding, high ceilings, and charming mullioned windows, the bedrooms are cozy and cheerful.

A location just outside the town of Nosara puts Villa Mariposa within easy reach of beaches and restaurants where you can enjoy everything from a quick local snack to a honeymoon-worthy dinner. It’s a 10-minute drive into Nosara, a 15-minute drive to the nearest beach, Playa Pelada, a 20-minute drive to the famous surfing beach of Playa Guiones and a 35-minute drive to the turtle nesting sites on Playa Ostional. Plan to fly into the airports in San Juan, Liberia, or Nosara, or ask to land your helicopter right on the property’s shared soccer field.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
For travelers seeking luxury and escape on the Mexican Riviera, the Punta Mita Resort has become the most exclusive destination. Among the coveted residential properties here, one of the finest is this newly renovated Hacienda de Mita villa, a beachfront vacation rental with panoramic ocean views and exquisite interior design.

The villa's covered terrace gazes out at the azure waters of the Bay of Banderas. With comfortable lounge furniture and an elegantly simple table for eight, the terrace is ideal for alfresco dining with family and friends, or sipping evening cocktails in the palm-filtered breeze. The terracotta-potted plants and elegant wicker armchairs evoke the earthy richness of local Mexican tradition. Below you, Hacienda de Mita's shared swimming pool abuts the white-sand beach.

The terrace transitions seamlessly into the open-plan living area, where the vaulted wooden ceiling beams seem like ocean-vessel oars, and gorgeous abstract paintings evoke the rhythms of the sea. The furnishings are natural, comfortable, and beautifully harmonious. A dining table for eight, with chairs of wood and woven leather, is perfect for ocean-view dining, while the kitchen, with its richly hued cabinetry, has a breakfast bar for three. The villa is particularly well-equipped for relaxing entertainment, with surround sound system, iPod docking station, and a 65-inch 4K SUHD TV with Netflix, Blu-Ray 4K DVD player, and DVD library.

The bedrooms are comfortable but cool, with naturalistic color palettes that echo sea, sky, and earth. The master bedroom features king size bed, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted bathtub, and French doors that open to a terrace with a spectacular ocean view. There is also a second bedroom with king bed and partial ocean view, a bedroom with two queen beds, and a fourth room with charming twin bunk beds—all with ensuite bathrooms.

With its prime location by the beach within the exclusive scope of Punta Mita, the villa gives you access to two Jack Nicklaus Championship Golf Courses as well as to St. Regis Beach, Kupuri Beach, and both the Resident's and Hacienda de Mita Beach Clubs. You can also walk five minutes to the Village of Punta de Mita. For fishing, surfing, kayaking, hiking, and rain forest adventures, Punta Mita is ideally situated.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Positano is a stunning, single-bedroom luxury villa overlooking Sapodilla Bay on the southern shore of Providenciales. The beachfront home offers an enchanting setting for a honeymoon or romantic escape to Turks and Caicos, with superb living areas, a private pool, and an ample master suite with expansive views of the bay and Caribbean Sea. The villa is within easy reach of Providenciales International Airport, allowing for easy arrival on your honeymoon or romantic escape.

Enjoy dreamy days and evenings on the villa's terrace, dipping into the pool and savoring the sunlight on elegant lounge chairs. A stepping-stone path leads from the patio to the white sands, and there's an outdoor shower for a quick rinse after a plunge. Take the kayak or paddleboard out onto the turquoise expanse or swim in the crystalline water, and return in the afternoon to alfresco meals from the barbeque. Bluetooth speakers invite you to play your favorite tunes as you cuddle up under the sunset sky.

The villa's interiors are made of luminous Carrera marble, accentuating the exquisite island light. A comfortable lounge faces a TV and wide vistas, with glass doors opening to the pool terrace. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-grade, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar. Air conditioning and ceiling fans maintain a cool ambiance at all times.

The master suite (occupying the second story of the villa) offers an open-concept layout beneath peaked, Balinese ceilings of rich natural wood. A glass wall frames vistas of the beach and bay, with sliding doors opening to a furnished balcony. An ample tub is perched on a marble platform behind the sumptuous king-size bed, inviting you to leisurely baths in the ocean breeze.

Beyond your beachfront sanctuary, you're an easy drive from the nightlife of Turtle Cove, as well as the pristine natural beauty of Princess Alexandra National Park. Turks and Caicos Tennis Club is just over six miles (ten kilometers) from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
